svg.text: Handle User Reports Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Handle User Reports
Actor(s):
Admin User
Description:
Dedicated admin workflow for reviewing, investigating, and resolving user-submitted
reports with status tracking, resolution actions, and comprehensive audit trails.
Preconditions:
1. Admin must be logged in with report management permissions
2. User reports must exist in the system queue
Main Flow:
1. Admin accesses user reports queue from admin dashboard
2. System displays reports filtered by status: Pending, In Progress, Resolved
3. System shows report categories: Inappropriate Content, Harassment, Spam, Technical
4. Admin selects specific report for detailed investigation
5. System displays complete report details: reporter, reported user, evidence, timestamp
6. Admin reviews reported content, user profiles, and interaction history
7. Admin investigates context and gathers additional evidence if needed
8. Admin determines violation severity and appropriate response action
9. Admin takes action: Resolve (no violation), Investigate (needs more review), Escalate
10. Admin provides detailed resolution notes and reasoning
11. System updates report status and logs all admin actions
12. System sends resolution notifications to reporter and reported user
13. Admin monitors report resolution effectiveness and user compliance
14. System maintains comprehensive audit trail for all report handling
Alternative Flows:
A1. Urgent report: High-priority reports receive immediate admin attention
A2. Complex investigation: Admin sets report to "In Progress" for extended review
A3. False report: Admin marks report as invalid and may take action against false reporter
A4. Escalation: Admin forwards serious violations to higher authority or legal team
A5. Batch processing: Admin handles multiple similar reports efficiently
